Developer API of TaskManager for Tomboy

0.1

This is the developer documentation for the TaskManager for Tomboy project.

This section is only interesting for you if you want to do changes to the code of this project.

To just install and use it, and for any other information, just have a look at the main project page: http://wiki.github.com/rggjan/Tomboy-Todo-List/

Developer Information

More information for developers is also available on this page.

To just get started hacking, however, have a look at this: http://github.com/rggjan/Tomboy-Todo-List/blob/master/doc/README.developer
